name: Portgas.D.Ace
effect: [On Play] If your Leader's type includes "Whitebeard Pirates", look at 5 cards from the top of your deck; reveal up to 1 Character card with a cost of 2 and add it to your hand. Then, place the rest at the bottom of your deck in any order and play up to 1 Character card with a cost of 2 from your hand rested.
